New Records: The White Sox avoided becoming the outright worst team in major-league history for a second consecutive night
Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi’s one-out line single to left in the 10th inning off lefty Jose Quijada scored free runner Miguel Vargas, walking off the Angels 4-3
Post-Match Reflections: Benintendi said, 'Guys aren’t going to pack it in'
Miscellaneous Highlights: A fan hold a sign saying he skipped school to watch the Sox win during the seventh inning of a game between the White Sox and the Los Angeles Angels, Wednesday, Sept. 25, 2024, in Chicago.
Others: The team ended a mind-numbingly bad 2024 season
